text: Johnny Dangerously is a 1984 American crime comedy movie directed by Amy Heckerling and starring Michael Keaton, Joe Piscopo, Marilu Henner, Maureen Stapleton, Peter Boyle, Griffin Dunne, Dom DeLuise, and Danny DeVito. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 comedy movies Category:1984 crime movies Category:1980s criminal comedy movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Amy Heckerling Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies set in a movie theatre
title: Johnny Dangerously
